word_mean: 电感：电路的特性，当电路通电时，电路即产生磁场。电感单位(或自感〔应〕单位)是享利(henry)

sentence.Network_en: A matrix of this sort occurs, for example, in electric networks when mutual inductance is present.
sentence.Network_cn: 例如, 当电网络中有互感时,就会出现这种阵矩.

sentence.Network_en: A capacitor is used to eliminate sparking when a circuit containing inductance is suddenly opened.
sentence.Network_cn: 当含有电感的电路突然断开时,电容器可用以消除火花.

sentence.Network_en: The effects of inductance and capacitance make it necessary to carefully design all AC transmission systems.
sentence.Network_cn: 电感和电容的影响,使人们必须精心地设计所有的交流输电系统.

means.word_mean: 1. (physics) a property of an electric circuit by which an electromotive force is induced in it by a variation of current
2. an electrical device that introduces inductance into a circuit
